import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Container, Navbar, Nav } from 'react-bootstrap' import styled from 'styled-components' import '../../style/index.css' import Link from 'next/link' const NavMB = styled(Navbar)` width: 100%; position: fixed; top:0; background-color: #263843 !important; z-index: 999; ` const Logo = styled.div` display:inline-block; width: 125px; @media (max-width: 768px){ width: 100px; } ` const Img = styled.img` width:100%; ` const Item = styled.span` margin: 0 15px; cursor: pointer; color: #fff; ` const NavLink = styled(Nav.Link)` text-align: center; padding: 10px 0 10px 0; ` const Icon = styled.img` width:30px; ` const IconLink = styled(Nav.Link)` text-align: center; padding: 50px; ` const Navul = styled.ul` & > li{ margin: 15px 0px; } ` const ItemBod = styled.img` width: 120px; ` const NavHomeMobile = () => { const [active ,setActive] = useState(false) const toggle = () => { setActive(!active) } return( <>
